name: Ninja Froggies
summary:
Ninja Froggies is a tower defense game in which you help the little Froggies to defend their pond against the Fishies that try to evade it and snacc their Tadpoles!

With a variety of brave warriors you can build up a strong army of Froggies to fight the waves of enemies approaching. Each Froggy has their own unique power or effect that either serve to fight head on or help others by increasing certain stats.
